Package civitas.celestis.math

Class Scalars

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.math.Scalars
public final class Scalars extends Object
Contains mathematical utilities related to scalars.

    • requireRange

      public static double requireRange(double val, double min, double max)
      Explicitly denotes that a field requires a value to be within the range of [min, max]. If the condition is met, this will simply return the value it was provided. Otherwise, it will throw an IllegalArgumentException with the appropriate message.
      Parameters:
      val - The value to validate
      min - The minimum allowed value
      max - The maximum allowed value
      Returns:
      The value given as the parameter (val)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the value is out of range

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The factorial of n

    • factorial

      public static long factorial(long n)
      Calculates the factorial of the provided input n. Note that this requires a non-negative input. Values over 20 will trigger an integer overflow.
      Parameters:
      n - The number to get the factorial of
      Returns:
      The factorial of n
